column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////When our house is slow
column2: our bartenders have more time to chat and interact with customers in the traditional sense; however
column5: our bar turns into a New York City deli counter during lunch rush: Customers want their drinks and their food
column6: and they want them fast sans errors. Occasionally the bartenders can banter and maintain their smiles
column7: but during dinner service they are handling drink orders and to-go orders from the approximately 80 other seats in the restaurant
column8: so things can get a little stressful.
